transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello haan ji
Executive: Haan ji
Customer: India Mart se baat kar rahi hu
Executive: Haan ji India Mart se Prachi baat kar rahi hu aap bataiye sir aap
Customer: Main yehi bata raha tha ki isko band hi kar dete aap mere account ko aur paise vagera refund kar dete to acha rehta kyunki aapki taraf se to koi wo hai nahi
Executive: Ek second sir main aapko
Customer: Properly lead nahi milta hai mere ko ek ek ek dedh mahine se baat kar raha tha ye ye aap sabko bolu ki ye change kar de wo change kar de ye aapki zimmedari hai lead aane ka main har baar aap bol dete ho ye cheez nahi ki wo cheez nahi ki kya karna hai mere ko ye bataiye main work karta hu under water hai sir iske alawa kya chahiye aapko
Executive: Main aapki profile ek baar le leti hu just a second
Customer: Mam aapko jo karna hai wo kar dijiye mere ko proper lead aana chahiye wo aapki zimmedari hai har baar ye change karna ye karna wo karna ye aapki zimmedari hai meri nahi hai aur maine apne barabar kar rakha hai har cheez ka
Customer: Barabar rate de rakha hai maine
Customer: Do mahine se kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai mam band kar dijiye na mahine ka paisa to saal ka pura dete ho to ek bhi lead nahi dete ho to mere ko return kar diya karo mahine ka paisa
Executive: Wait please main profile open kar rahi hu aapki ID se hogi bataiye
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close account and get refund.

- Not getting proper leads.

- Asks what else is required from his side.



Resolution:

- Executive put the call on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, account closure
